com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.locationlayer

Class LocationLayerMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.locationlayer.LocationLayerMode

  • public class LocationLayerMode
extends Object
    Contains the variety of Location Layer modes which shape the behavior of the plugin.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LocationLayerMode.Mode
      One of these constants should be used when LocationLayerPlugin.setLocationLayerEnabled(int)'s called.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COMPASS
      Tracking the bearing of the user based on sensor data.
      static int NAVIGATION
      Tracking the user location in navigation mode.
      static int NONE
      All Tracking, bearing, and location are disabled.
      static int TRACKING
      Basic tracking is enabled.
